description: Ms. codex. Title from text 2. Origin: Text 6, 3 Shaʻbān 1364 H [14 July 1945] (leaf 54a): this appears to be an error. Texts 8-9, 1302 H [1884 or 1885], by the author (leaves 60b, 67b). Text 11, 1303 H [1885 or 1886] (leaf 76b). Remaining texts likely completed around the same time. 1. leaves 1b-14a: Hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah al-musammá bi-Ḥadīth al-qudsī alladhī awḥá Allāh taʻālá ilá Mūsá ibn ʻImrān. 2. leaves 17b-30b: Risālah fī bayān ṣiyagh al-nikāḥ wa-al-ṭalāq / Jaʻfar al-Astarābādī. 3. leaves 32b-37a: [al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah fī al-tajwīd] / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī. 4. leaves 40b-42b: Min kitāb al-mawsūm bi-Ithná ʻasharīyah fī al-furūq. 5. leaves 43a-46a: [Selections from Wuṣūl al-akhyār ilá uṣūl al-akhbār] / Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Ṣamad al-Ḥārithī. 6. leaves 46b-54a: Risālah fī maʻrifat mashāyikh al-Shīʻah. 7. leaf 54b: [Persian poem] / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī. 8. leaves 56b-60b: Kashf al-awzān / Muḥammad Mahdī ibn Muḥammad Jaʻfar al-Musawī. 9. leaves 60b-67b: [Sharḥ al-Rawḍah al-bahīyah] / Muḥammad Mahdī ibn Muḥammad Jaʻfar al-Musawī. 10. leaf 68a: [Persian poem]. 11. leaves 71b-76b: Masʼalat ḥalq al-liḥá / Muḥammad Āghā-yi Mujtahid.
abstract: Collection of Arabic texts on a variety of subjects.
extent: 78 leaves : paper ; 217 x 168 (137-180 x 72-111) mm bound to 217 x 171 mm
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Limp brown leather with blind-tooled fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
